synonym.title: Define a library

synonym.title: Hoisting
Final variables
Arrays / Lists

synonym.code: // Ceylon has a Map interface for key-value pairs Map<String, String> periodic = HashMap();

synonym.title: Appropriate keys
Accessing values
Sets (collections of unique items)
Queues (FIFO)
Raw strings
Interpolation
Concatenation
Substring
Replace all occurences
synonym.code: "doghouses".replace("s", "z") // == "doghouzez"

synonym.title: Replace one occurence
synonym.code: "racecar".replaceFirst("r", "sp") // == "spacecar"

synonym.title: Multi-line strings
Split into an array
Test whether a string starts with a substring
synonym.code: "racecar".startsWith("race") // == true "racecar".startsWith("pace") // == false

synonym.title: If statements
Ternary statements
Checking for empty string
Checking for zero
Checking for null
Checking for NaN
Checking for undefined
synonym.code: // Ceylon does not have a concept of undefined value

synonym.title: Value and identity equality
Function definition
Return value
Assign a function to a variable
synonym.code:
value loudify = (String msg) => msg.uppercased;
loudify("not gonna take it anymore") // == NOT GONNA TAKE IT ANYMORE

synonym.title: Optional parameters
Parameters with default values
Named parameters
Variable number of arguments
For loops for lists
For-in loops
For loops for objects/maps
Closures and counters in loops
Define
Constructor with parameter
synonym.code: class Person2(shared String name) { }

synonym.title: Instantiate
Reflection
synonym.code: value name = "Bob"; type(name) // == ceylon.language::String

synonym.title: Check the type
synonym.code:
value name = "Bob"; assert(is String name); // Compilation error as it knows name is a String
String | Integer name = "Jack"; // Can be either a string or an integer assert(is String name); // -> OK
